productDescShort: DETAILS & CARE A glinting logo buckle taken from the archives, substantial chain trim and a floppy grosgrain bow in signature Web racing stripes add unmistakable branding to a sophisticated Italian handbag. The grosgrain shoulder strap and leather crossbody strap provide convenient carrying options, while the structured silhouette ensures that the covetable piece keeps its shape when you set it down. Top buckle flap closure Optional shoulder strap; optional, adjustable crossbody strap Interior zip, wall and smartphone pockets Sueded microfiber lining Leather Made in Italy Designer Handbags Item #5127084
